effect.scarlet_violet: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.the_teal_mask: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.
effect.legends_za: Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP. This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon’s susceptibility to rock moves. rapid spin removes this effect from its user’s side of the field.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
short_effect.legends_za: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.
